title: Lynda - Design the Web: CSS Animated Rollovers
description:
Lynda - Design the Web: CSS Animated Rollovers 

29m 46s Beginner Aug 05, 2015 
Subject: Web 
Software: CSS 
Author: Chris Converse 

Uploaded in Aug 24, 2015 Via Webcentara

Learn to create animated rollovers with CSS3. Animated rollovers are an easy way to enhance the user experience of your website, without adding more markup to your page, or working with JavaScript. Author Chris Converse shows how to change the color and typography of your rollovers using different CSS properties, add and animate pseudo-elements, and animate clip properties of absolute-positioned elements. The exercise files are free to all members, so download them and get started enhancing your website today.
